Detailed Description

this file contains a declaration of helper functions used by the command line interface

Authors:
Daouda Traore (daouda.traore@sysfera.com) and Ibrahima Cisse (ibrahima.cisse@sysfera.com)

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum ErrorType

a convenient type to classify error type

Enumerator:
PARAMERROR 

for any invalid parameter error

EXECERROR 

for any runtime error

Function Documentation

void checkVishnuConfig ( const Options &  opt  ) 

A helper function which check if VISHNU_CONFIG_FILE is set.

Parameters:
opt,: describes all options allowed by the command
Exceptions:
raise a runtime exception if the VISHNU_CONFIG_FILE is not set

int usage ( const Options &  opt,
const std::string &  mess,
const std::string &  ewhat 
)

Helper function to display information (error or usage) about a specific command.

Parameters:
opt :describes all options allowed by the command
mess,: The help usage message to display
ewhat : The error message to display
Returns:
0 if an help is required or 1 if an error must me displayed
